DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the effects of an interactive educational program delivered through a patient portal on patients' medication knowledge and medication adherence.
DOC.brief_title: The Impact of a "Serious Game" on Improving Patient's Medication Knowledge
DOC.criteria: 1. MGH Internal Medical Associates patients 2. are age of 18 or older, 3. have at least two medications on their medication list that match our preselected medications, 4. have at least three medical conditions on their problem list that match our preselected medical conditions, 5. have at least three medications documented on their medication list, and 6. list English as their primary language.
